item.title: Version 0.13.0
item.description:
SupaSidebar 0.13.0

Whatâ€™s New

  • Notes: Add notes to any link or folder. Keep context and thoughts alongside your saved content. Search links using fuzzy search on notes as well.
  • Tags: Organize links with custom tags for better categorization and filtering.
  • AI-Powered Auto Tagging: SupaSidebar now suggests relevant tags automatically using on-device AI (MLX) or openai models(API key needed).

Improvements

  • Glass Theme Compact Mode: Fixed compact mode visual issues when using the glass theme.

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed multi-monitor usage for dock mode.
  • Fixed multi-window support issues.
  • Fixed existing tabs not opening correctly from recents.
  • Fixed sidebar icon not displaying correctly.
  • Fixed sidebar closing unexpectedly when opening a pinned tab.

Notes

  • Background sync may result in higher CPU usage. This is expected behavior during sync operations.
